version_description:
Thank you for playing "The Lost World".
The fixes in this update are as follows.

If you have physical attack invalidation, you will no longer be damaged by physical damage traps.
Changed the images and descriptions of some skills. (The effects have not changed.) - Improved stability.
Improved stability. Fixed some problems with the story.

Thank you for playing "The Lost World".
The following are the fixes in this update.

Fixed a bug where the volume could not be raised after setting it to 0.
Fixed a bug where the volume setting did not work for battle sound effects.
Fixed a bug where the volume setting did not work for battle sound effects.
-> We've been working on a new version of the game for a while now.
If you restart the game after adventuring on all the maps, it will become lighter.
We apologize for the inconvenience.
As an apology, we've increased the amount of prayers you receive when you watch video ads.
-> This measure may be reverted later.
Stability improvements (fixes for bugs such as not coming back during adventures)

Thank you for playing "The Lost World".
The following are the fixes in this update.

New maps have been added.
Increased the availability of money for long term adventures (in some areas)
Fixed some equipment wording.
Some equipment wording has been fixed. ãƒ»The number of equipment/holdings is displayed when creating recipes.
Fixed the ability to specify which monsters to use in chat.
Added a button in the upper right corner of the material dialog to search for the material.
